title: EQUALS
description: Returns TRUE if the value matches any of the given compare_values (case-sensitive); otherwise, returns FALSE.

parameters.name: â€¦compare_values
parameters.description: One or more values to compare with the given value.

examples:
EQUALS(Status, "Open", "Closed")
-- Returns TRUE if Status is "Open" or "Closed"(case-sensitive); otherwise, returns FALSE.
